trans-unit.source: The DsmlInvalidDocumentException class is an exception that occurs when a DSML Request or Response document is not well-formed XML or cannot be validated with DSMLv2 schema.
trans-unit.target: DsmlInvalidDocumentException 类是当 DSML 请求时发生的异常或响应文档不是格式良好 XML 或无法使用 DSMLv2 架构进行验证。

trans-unit.source: The DsmlInvalidDocumentException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlInvalidDocumentException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: DsmlInvalidDocumentException 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlInvalidDocumentException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The default text message displayed to the client is "The DSML document could not be parsed."
trans-unit.target: 向客户端显示的默认文本消息为"无法分析 DSML 文档"。

trans-unit.source: The DsmlInvalidDocumentException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlInvalidDocumentException"></xref> class using the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: DsmlInvalidDocumentException 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlInvalidDocumentException"></xref>类使用指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 显示到客户端时，将引发异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The DsmlInvalidDocumentException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlInvalidDocumentException"></xref> class using the specified serialization data and streaming contextual data.
trans-unit.target: DsmlInvalidDocumentException 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlInvalidDocumentException"></xref>类使用指定的序列化数据和流上下文数据。

trans-unit.source: The serialized object data about the exception thrown.
trans-unit.target: 有关引发的异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The contextual data about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文数据。

trans-unit.source: The DsmlInvalidDocumentException constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlInvalidDocumentException"></xref> class using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: DsmlInvalidDocumentException 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlInvalidDocumentException"></xref>类使用指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 显示到客户端时，将引发异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>, if any, that threw the exception.
